sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { ADD_TO_CART, COOKBOOK_LOAD_ITEMS } from "../../redux/actions"; import axios from "axios"; import ShopPageItemComponentMobile from "./ShopPageItemComponentMobile"; import ShopPageItemComponentDesktop from "./ShopPageItemComponentDesktop"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import CartButton from "../shared/img/Cart_Button_main.png"; import BBQPlanks_Header from "../shared/img/BBQPlanks_Header.png"; import Shop_MenuHeader from "../shared/img/Shop_MenuHeader.png"; const BBQPlanksPage = () => { const url = "http://localhost:5000/api/products/5"; const [bbqPlanks, setBBQPlanks] = useState([]); const [qty, setQty] = useState(0); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const incomingItems = useSelector((state) => state.itemsReducers); useEffect(() => { const fetchData = async () => { const result = await axios("http://localhost:5000/api/products/5"); setBBQPlanks(result.data); }; fetchData(); }, []); const handleSetQty = (qty) => { setQty(qty.target.value.split(/\D/).join("")); }; const handleAddToCart = (qty, ProductID, Name, Price) => { setQty(qty); dispatch(ADD_TO_CART(qty, ProductID, Name, Price)); console.log(qty, ProductID, Name, Price); }; return (
SPICE RUBS COOKBOOKS BAKING PLANKS BBQ PLANKS NUT DRIVER
    SPICE RUBS COOKBOOKS BAKING PLANKS BBQ PLANKS NUT DRIVERS

Cedar and Alder planks impart a subtle yet full flavored aroma to anything roasted on them. Our planks are made from clear kiln dried Western Red Cedar and Alder. Cedar roasting planks come in two sizes. Alder planks are available in one size only.
